entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
